content: समुत्था {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To stand up, rise. {@--2@} To rise from death or insensibility, return to life or consciousness. {@--3@} To rise together with. {@--4@} To arise or spring from. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To raise up, lift up, elevate. {@--2@} To revive, restore to life.
